import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { Chart } from '../models/Chart'; import { ChartService } from '../services/chart.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-chart', templateUrl: './chart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./chart.component.scss'], }) export class ChartComponent implements OnInit { boolPopin: boolean = false; charts$!: Observable; percent = 0.75; color = 'yellow'; constructor(private chartService: ChartService) { this.charts = [ { id: 1, percent: 0.25, day: 'mon' }, { id: 2, percent: 0.55, day: 'tue' }, { id: 3, percent: 0.45, day: 'wed' }, { id: 4, percent: 0.25, day: 'thu' }, { id: 5, percent: 0.1, day: 'fri' }, { id: 6, percent: 0.9, day: 'sat' }, { id: 7, percent: 0.8, day: 'sun' }, ]; let arr = []; for (let i = 0; i < this.charts.length; i++) { arr.push(this.charts[i].percent) } const max = Math.max(...arr); console.log(max) this.chartService.getPercentage(max) } ngOnInit(): void { } showPopin(index: number) { this.boolPopin = true; } }
